data.actual_result: Status, user name and avatar will start to shake.
data.expected_result: Members list remains responsive and does not shake
data.short_description: Once flipping through the list of users on the server, I noticed that sometimes some names, icons were shaking.
data.steps_to_repro: - 1. Go to any server where there are many users. - 2. Begin slowly to wind the slider down. - 3. After a while, the user's name, avatar and status will be shaking.
